title: Bridging with Wormhole
description: Learn about Wormhole, a cross-chain messaging protocol that enables secure bridges between Aptos and other major blockchains for token transfers, NFTs, and general message passing.

tasks.title: Prepare for Cross-Chain Activities
tasks.description: Add at least 0.1 APT to your wallet to explore Wormhole bridging capabilities

tasks.title: Wormhole Basics
tasks.description: Understand what Wormhole is and its role in blockchain interoperability
tasks.question: What is Wormhole's primary function?
options: A Layer 2 scaling solution
A cross-chain messaging and bridging protocol
A DEX aggregator
A centralized exchange
tasks.correctAnswer: A cross-chain messaging and bridging protocol

tasks.title: Security Model
tasks.question: How does Wormhole secure cross-chain messages?
options: Through a single validator
Using a network of Guardian validators that observe and verify messages
By requiring manual approval for all transfers
Through a centralized server
tasks.correctAnswer: Using a network of Guardian validators that observe and verify messages

tasks.title: Supported Blockchains
tasks.description: Understand which chains can connect to Aptos via Wormhole
tasks.question: Which of these blockchains can connect with Aptos through Wormhole?
options: Only Ethereum and Solana
Only Sui and Ethereum
Over 20 chains including Ethereum, Solana, BNB Chain, Polygon, and more
None of the above
tasks.correctAnswer: Over 20 chains including Ethereum, Solana, BNB Chain, Polygon, and more

tasks.title: Token Bridge
tasks.description: Learn about moving tokens across chains
tasks.question: How does Wormhole's token bridge work?
options: By transferring the original token directly to the destination chain
By locking/burning tokens on the source chain and creating wrapped versions on the destination chain
By using atomic swaps between chains
By converting all tokens to a single intermediary token
tasks.correctAnswer: By locking/burning tokens on the source chain and creating wrapped versions on the destination chain

tasks.title: NFT Bridge
tasks.question: What happens when you bridge an NFT using Wormhole?
options: NFTs cannot be bridged across chains
The NFT is duplicated on both chains simultaneously
The original NFT is locked and a wrapped version is minted on the destination chain
The NFT is converted to a fungible token during transfer
tasks.correctAnswer: The original NFT is locked and a wrapped version is minted on the destination chain

tasks.title: Aptos Integration
tasks.description: Learn how Wormhole is implemented on Aptos
tasks.question: How is Wormhole integrated with the Aptos blockchain?
options: Through a centralized relay service
Through Move modules deployed on Aptos
Through a Layer 2 solution
It operates entirely off-chain
tasks.correctAnswer: Through Move modules deployed on Aptos

tasks.title: Generic Messaging
tasks.question: Beyond token transfers, what can Wormhole's generic messaging do?
options: Only support basic token transfers
Enable cross-chain governance, liquidity, lending, and other custom applications
Send messages only to Ethereum and Solana
Only provide read-only data across chains
tasks.correctAnswer: Enable cross-chain governance, liquidity, lending, and other custom applications

tasks.title: Bridge Fees
tasks.description: Learn about the cost of using Wormhole bridges
tasks.question: How are fees typically structured for Wormhole bridges?
options: No fees are charged
Users pay gas fees on source chain plus relayer fees on destination chain
Fixed fee regardless of destination
Subscription model with unlimited transfers
tasks.correctAnswer: Users pay gas fees on source chain plus relayer fees on destination chain

tasks.title: Portal Bridge
tasks.description: Learn about Wormhole's main token bridge implementation
tasks.question: What is Portal in the Wormhole ecosystem?
options: A blockchain explorer
Wormhole's official token bridge for transferring assets between chains
A governance platform
A wallet for storing assets
tasks.correctAnswer: Wormhole's official token bridge for transferring assets between chains
